Total Cost of Revenue: cost of goods and services sold

Income Before Taxes: income loss from continuing operations before income taxes extraordinary items noncontrolling interest
Net Income: net income loss available to common stockholders basic

Other Income (Expense): gain loss on disposition of assets
income loss from equity method investments

Basic EPS: income loss from continuing operations per basic share
Diluted EPS: income loss from continuing operations per diluted share
Weighted Average Shares Outstanding (Dil: weighted average number of shares issued diluted

__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share cash paid
discontinued operation gain loss on disposal of discontinued operation net of tax
discontinued operation gain loss on disposal of discontinued operation net of tax per basic share
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
preferred stock dividends income statement impact
income loss from continuing operations before income taxes minority interest and income loss from equity method investments
